title: Material Goals: Inspirational or Selfish?, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO183
itunes:title: Material Goals: Inspirational or Selfish?, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO183
description: When I first bought and drove luxury sports cars like my Lambo, I didn't tell anyone about it. I felt guilty and embarrassed because so many people think being motivated by material things is immoral. I have come to believe they are wrong. While life is more than material things, it is legit to use them as motivation. In fact, they are a great motivation. In this episode, I tell you why.
